name: Pistachio Hotel Sapa
address: Group 5, Thac Bac Street, Sapa, Lao Cai, Sa Pa, Việt Nam
description:
Tọa lạc ở Sa Pa, cách Trạm cáp treo Fansipan 4.6 km, Pistachio Hotel Sapa cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có hồ bơi ngoài trời, chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí, trung tâm thể dục và phòng chờ chung. Với quầy bar, khách sạn nằm gần một số điểm tham quan nổi tiếng, cách Hồ Sa Pa 12 phút đi bộ, Sa Pa Stone Church 500 m và Sa Pa Bus Station chưa đến 1 km. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Phòng khách tại khách sạn được trang bị điều hòa, khu vực ghế ngồi, TV màn hình phẳng có truyền hình vệ tinh, két an toàn, phòng tắm riêng, vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh, đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí và máy sấy tóc. Các phòng đều có ấm đun nước, trong đó một số phòng có ban công và một số khác thì nhìn ra thành phố. Tại Pistachio Hotel Sapa, phòng nào cũng có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Chỗ nghỉ có phục vụ bữa sáng thực đơn buffet hoặc kiểu lục địa. Tại Pistachio Hotel Sapa, khách sẽ tìm thấy nhà hàng phục vụ ẩm thực sushi, Việt và địa phương. Bên cạnh đó, họ có thể yêu cầu đồ ăn Halal, kosher (cho người đạo Do Thái) và không chứa gluten.

Khách sạn cung cấp chỗ nghỉ 4 sao với hồ bơi trong nhà và sân hiên.

Pistachio Hotel Sapa cách Ham Rong Garden - Ham Rong Mountain 17 phút đi bộ và Thung lũng Mường Hoa 11 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Wenshan Puzhehei, cách chỗ nghỉ 221 km.

review.comment_positive:
De locatie is ideaal om snel bij de restaurants van Sapa te komen. Het uitzicht vanaf de kamer (geboekt met zicht op de bergen) is geweldig en wat ons betreft het extra geld waard. De kamers voldoen in alle opzichten aan Westerse standaarden en verdient zeker de vier sterren. 
Het ontbijtbuffet is zeer uitgebreid en kwalitatief erg goed!
review.comment_negative:
We hebben erg veel geluidsoverlast gehad van de bouwwerkzaamheden naast het hotel. Het hotel geeft aan hier niets aan te kunnen doen, wat klopt. Echter was een melding vooraf netjes geweest, zeker als je ruim een maand voor arriveren het geld al van mijn creditcard boekt. Een waarschuwing, gratis annuleren na aankomst of korting had gemoeten als je je als 4-sterren hotel wilt profileren. De werkzaamheden starten om 07:00u en duren tot 17:00u, met een korte break rond 13:00u.

In de badkamer lagen nog haren van onze voorgangers, niet fijn! De gang ruikt naar rook, evenals onze badkamer die via het luchtfilter ook een rooklucht had. Er lagen zelfs peuken op het bordje waar op staat “niet roken”. 

De zwembaden zijn beiden niet geweldig. Voor zo’n 200 mogelijke gasten staan er vier stoelen en twee ligbedjes per zwembad. Het rooftop-zwembad is prachtig voor de foto’s, maar wel koud. Hou hier rekening mee!

review.rating: Epic location, super staff. Excellent value for money

The customer service lady is wonderful, she was super helpful and friendly and even gave us an upgrade! We booked another night on our way back, just because it was so lovely. Thanks guys!

review.comment_positive:
Location was great, we had a lovely mountain view.
The room was large and quite beautiful.
There were plenty of food options and the restaurant was open most time.
Staf was lovely and trying to accommodate our needs.
review.comment_negative:
A bit pricey but I guess it was worth it.
There was a lot of construction going on which oind of ruins the amazing views and created a lot of background noise.
All taxies ordered were a bit over priced, hard to find a taxi that matches the tariffs they have on the screen.
We ordered a taxi and the driver said its a fixed fee for 100,000 vnd to Cat cat village, but there were a lot of constructions over there so we only reached out to 1/4 of way and they got a full charge, so be very mindful of overpriced taxi prices- always negotiate

review.room_type: Phòng Superior City Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
J’aurai vraiment voulu laisser un bon commentaire pour cet hôtel, mais malheureusement nous avons payé LE DOUBLE de ce qui était prévu. L’hôtel nous a prélevé deux fois le montant du séjour. 
Nous sommes retournés à la réception qui nous a confirmé qu’un remboursement serait fait dans les 7 jours (11 novembre 2023). 
Aujourd’hui nous sommes le 22 novembre 2023, l’hôtel nous a confirmé avoir bien reçu l’argent deux fois mais toujours AUCUN REMBOURSEMENT. 
Le personnel de l’hôtel qui doit gérer cet erreur nous parle maintenant de 15 à 45 jours pour que le remboursement soit fait! Une honte surtout que l’erreur vient d’eux et que l’ont parle d’une grosse sommes d’argent (3nuits de payées). 
Très déçu et toujours dans l’attente d’un remboursement !
review.comment_negative: Faites attention à cet hôtel

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Wow the service here was great from start to finish. The welcoming drink’s start you off right as the hotel is getting the last finishing touches done for our stay. We booked 2 days and loved it so much that we had to stay an additional 2 days. The staff decorated the room so nice for our arrival. They upgraded our room for free and gave us one of the best rooms that had to offer no charge and even extended the same room at the low price. They gave us a 20% off voucher towards the spa that we utilized on the third day and it was so relaxing. They extended our check out because our bus wasn’t going to arrive for a couple hours. We had to still wait an additional 3 hours for the bus after check out tho and during that time they welcomed us to still use all amenities the hotel offers including the pool so clearly it was about making sure we were comfortable and not about the money. ￼This is the kinda hotel you would recommend to family and friends also return to anytime you visit SaPa. Money well spent we look forward to coming back in the future. Oh and I forgot the food was so good!
review.comment_negative: So complaints at all.

review.rating: I regret coming to this hotel. Value for money is very low
review.room_type: Suite Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Clean, excellent and varied breakfast, the view from the rooftop pool is amazing
review.comment_negative:
Really really bad service. 
I asked for an extra bed for the room (three children) they didn't agree, I asked to speak to the person in charge of the shift and after fifteen minutes I was told that he is at home and couldn't talk but could give me an extra blanket or pillow. 
safe box at the room not working. 
Bar on the rooftop without anyone, I called reception from the phone in the bar and they said they would send someone and of course no one came. 
Very few towels for the pool most of the time there were no clean or dry towels. 
The pool coating is peeling off and the pool is dirty because of it. 
The pool on one floor is small with almost no place to sit (3 chairs) and it is not allowed to open the windows and it smells and is really disgusting to be in this pool. 
In conclusion, this hotel can be luxurious but the service is bad and the cost is really not worth what you get !!!

쾌적한 객실, 조용한 시설이 좋았습니다.
직원분들은 매우 친절하고 특히 Chau 라는 직원분께서 체크아웃 후 떠날때까지 매우 친절히 대해주었습니다.

review.comment_negative: We were a bit let down by the room, particularly the bathroom the shower was broken when we arrived (my partner had to fix it) and it just felt a bit old, and the toilet didn't flush properly. One of the days after staff had serviced the room they left a massive puddle of water in the bathroom which we had to use towels to mop up.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Mountain view room is excellent. Receptionist staff are helpful but some of their English isn’t very good. Foot neck & shoulder Massage is really good. Price is very reasonable even with a 20% discount.
review.comment_negative: Outdoor pool too cold. The rooftop bar plays loud & noisy music which is disturbing for relaxing guests at the pool during the afternoon.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
住宿地點絕佳，可以同時享受山上的風景不受鬧區的喧擾，但又可以直接從飯店一樓步行五分鐘就抵達Sapa車站。飯店房間的山景 view 非常的療癒，起床映入眼簾的Sapa層層的梯田還有藍天，時不時會看到纜車經過，如夢一般的場景。
飯店還有提供免費的卡拉OK，非常推薦！
無邊際泳池跟溫水泳池都非常的小，前者適合拍照，後者只適合小孩玩水，不適合成人游泳。
review.comment_negative:
1.房務
這次入住兩天，房間浴室的水龍頭在我們抵達第一天就反應出現問題，包括：1)花灑會向旁邊亂噴無法集中出水，2)水溫設定無法固定常溫，不是太熱就是太冷。我們嘗試向櫃檯反應，他們立即送了維修人員來房間處理。不過維修人員無法使用英文溝通，僅僅換了一組新的花灑就準備離開，舊的水龍頭原本也不打算帶走，就直接留在浴缸中。第二天一早我們嘗試再向櫃檯反應淋浴間出水的溫度問題，你只得到禮貌的微笑跟他們會請人去確認，但是依照櫃檯重複要求我們repeat我們的問題，推測應該是當天櫃檯人員的英文溝通也有障礙，果然當天晚上的淋浴依舊是熱水太熱冷水太冷，無法恆溫。

2.早餐
餐點普通，雖說有很多中式餐點選擇，但口味都不怎麼樣。未來可以考慮多添加越南當地的特色料理。

3.櫃檯
抵達Sapa是早上6am，已經在櫃檯辦理check-in，但櫃檯經理告知房間要 2pm才會好。等到下午要辦理入住時，櫃檯又重新要了一次護照需要重新辦理check-in，給人的感覺不專業。另外就是當我們反應房間淋浴間的狀況時，櫃檯人員無法理解我們的問題，反覆要求我們重複，事後也沒有維修。

review.rating: Stunning Views with Five Star Service

review.comment_positive: This property was beautiful and in a great location.    VERY nice room overlooking the valley below and an incredible rooftop infinity pool.   What made this property five stars though was the incredible staff!    The guest relations manager Tran Minh Chau was INCREDIBLE!    She ensured that every part of our stay was spectacular, she arranged for laundry services, and transportation, and made recommendations for things to do/see in town.  She even responded to messages after she left work.   I would HIGHLY recommend this property for travelers to Sapa.

review.comment_positive:
Superlative hotel, with huge rooms, breathtaking views of the valley and surrounding mountains, hyper professional and friendly staff, all spaces (including bathrooms and hallways) spotlessly clean, breakfast incredible in variety and flavors.
In addition perfect location to visit Sa Pa and leave for excursions, massage center and SPA among the best I have ever seen, indoor heated pool and infinity pool on the 12th floor which is a sight to behold.
p.s. on the night of my girlfriend's birthday we heard a knock at the door: three waiters brought the cake in the picture to our room, singing and wishing us the best.

review.rating: Not a good stay in Sapa
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: location
review.comment_negative:
We were assigned to room 501 when they had construction nearby from 7am to 2am. The construction site just right outside our balcony though it supposed to be a Mountain View. Called Front Desk at 12.40 am since it was very loud till I could not sleep he said he would send security to check and ask them to stop, how can? He called back saying the construction would stop half and hour later but it was not. Called him again at 1.20 am after half an hour to inform the construction was still continuing like not gonna stop soon. 

When we already checked out on the following day, FO manager came to apologise for the incident and offered us a Herbal Soak bath voucher, I don’t think we need this after we already checked out. 

We should have told upon checking-in if the construction site is just right outside the balcony. When we checked-in already saw the construction but did not expect it was gonna be last till 2am at night that’s why we did not want to make thing to difficult for them by asking to change the room. When I complained this to the hotel (via Booking.com app) their reply to seek my sympathy since the construction is beyond there control. Can I also seek their sympathy when they assigned us to the room as near to the construction site and I could not get to sleep till 2am at night and the construction restarted again at 7am on the following morning? 

Can you imagine, our room is 501 while the hotel lobby is located on the 6th floor which means our room is nearer to the construction site than the lobby.

I know the construction is uncontrollable but we should have been informed about this in advance or our room should be away from the construction site Eg. high floor on the other side

Para el precio que tiene, me quede un poco decepcionada en general. 

El spa es malísimo, no es un spa es un cuarto con 3 butacas. El masaje es bastante malo, y es muy caro, los de la calle valían la mitad de precio, además los precios no incluyen (y no lo dicen) algo que llaman 5% de servicio y 10% de impuestos, así que acabas pagando 15% mas por el masaje sin que te lo avisan.  (Pasa también en el bar)

review.rating: Great hospitality, nice mountain view and good hotel to sum up your Sapa trip
review.room_type: Phòng Superior City Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Staffs is very polite, well trained and friendly, we met Client Relations Officer Ms Chau, had a great chat with her, guided us on how to get around in Sapa and recommended places to do and go. Had common topics and endless conversation as she used to work in Singapore before. Friendly and nice lady!

Location was a bit of a small climb but otherwise it is great, centralised and fantastic view of the mountain. The lure was the ultimate infinity swimming pool which I believe eveyone is there for.

Breakfast was basic but delicious and great.
review.comment_negative:
I know this had nothing to do with the hotel but the people hogging the photo spot at the infinity pool is horrendous. They hog the spot and never leave until they taken 100000000 photos.

The other small little issue that I have a feedback on is the door stopper in our room 906. The door stopper was infront of the wardrobe and on the floor, camouflaged within the tiles and many a times have kicked on it. I have attached a picture to show. Perhaps a small suggestion is for the hotel to tape a fluorescent take or paint it over in bright colours so it is obvious. Or adjust the door hinge so it doesn't goes all the way to the wardrobe. Other than this small issue everything else is fine.

review.comment_positive: 無痛升級成vip房，房間view很讚，直接看對面梯田，房間乾淨整潔，早餐好吃，服務也很到位，可幫忙叫車、協助加熱食物等等，很推薦

review.comment_positive: Grosses Zimmer, tolle Aussicht vom Rooftop, ruhige Lage, früherer Check-in war möglich.
review.comment_negative:
Neben dem Pool auf dem Dach waren nur 3 Liegestühle vorhanden und auch auf Anfrage haben wir keine zusätzlichen erhalten. Da die 3 Liegestühle immer besetzt sind, standen teilweise bis zu 20 Leute um dem Pool, konnten sich nicht hinsetzen und gingen wieder. Auch das Wasser im Pool war sehr dreckig. Es wirkt, als wäre der Pool nur für Fotos gedacht.
Der beheizte Pool im UG lädt nicht zum verweilen ein.
Wir haben bei unserer Ankunft auf dem Rooftop 2 Kaffees und 2 Joghurt bestellt, mussten 30min darauf warten (auch wenn wir die einzigen Gäste waren) und ohne Frühstück unsere Trekking Tour beginnen.
Frühstücksbuffet OK, hatten aber bessere in Vietnam.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: das Hotelzimmer war sehr geräumig und wunderschön eingerichtet. Wir haben uns sehr gefreut, als wir das Zimmer betreten haben. Die Lobby ist etwas in die Jahre gekommen, aber ebenfalls geräumig und bietet gemütliche Sitzmöglichkeiten sowie einen Willkommenstee, der es uns angetan hat. Beim Personal muss man leider Glück haben. Es waren auch Angestellte mit bei, die sehr bemüht waren.
review.comment_negative: Wir waren für 2 Nächte im Deluxe Zimmer mit Bergblick eingecheckt, nur hat uns niemand gesagt, dass wir außer Bergblick auch noch eine riesige(!) Baustelle vor der Tür haben. Die Baustellenarbeiten haben um 6:00 Uhr angefangen und es war trotz verschlossenem Fenster sehr laut, sodass wir nicht weiterschlafen konnten. Auch die Kissen haben keine Schlafqualität zugelassen, obwohl wir nach der ersten Nacht gleich die Rezeption darüber in Kenntnis gesetzt haben, wurde das nicht weiter verfolgt. Uns wurde nach Ansprache auf dieses Problem ein anderes Zimmer angeboten, bei dem es das selbe Problem gegeben hat. Das Hotel hat keine Ermäßigung für das Hotelzimmer angeboten, das finde ich enttäuschend, da wir erst gar nicht gebucht hätten, wenn wir über die Baustelle informiert werden würden. Es gab ein Nachlass von 5€ im Vergleich zu booking.com. Traurigerweise wird in diesem 4 Sterne Hotel, auch sonst nicht viel Wert auf Service und angemessenem Umgang mit Gästen gelegt. So waren wir beispielsweise am Mittag nach der ersten Nacht im A La Carte Restaurant des Hotels, das zum Zeitpunkt unseres Erscheinens komplett leer war. Dort angekommen, wollten wir gerade an einem Tisch mit schöner Aussicht auf die Umgebung Platz nehmen. Dieser Tisch bietet Platz für eine Gruppe. Noch auf dem Weg zum Tisch, entgegnete uns eine Hotelangestellte, blockierte uns den Weg zum Tisch, ging weiter zu einem anderen Tisch und stellte die Menükarten auf diesem ab, um uns durch diese nonverbale Geste zu signalisieren, wo wir zu sitzen haben. Als wir das Personal fragten warum es keine freie Sitzplatzauswahl in einem leeren Restaurant gebe, wurde uns mehrfach gesagt, dass wir zu zweit sind. Obwohl wir augenscheinlich die einzigen Gäste waren, hat man uns nicht dort sitzen lassen wollen. Zum Verständnis, die Speisen im Restaurant sind exklusive Leistungen und es waren keine Gäste zu erwarten.

Le personnel plutôt agréable, mais un serveur s'est permis de venir frappé à notre porte un matin pour nous demander si vous avions pris la veille un jeu de société. Un acte intolérable pour ce genre d'hôtel. On ne dérange pas des clients qui dorment pour un motif pareil... 
Un agent a l'accueil parle un français parfait très agréable. 
Belle piscine intérieure. Salle de sport. Hôtel bien placé dans SAPA, tout se fait à pied c'est top.

review.comment_positive: Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés !!! Cet hôtel est magnifique et le service est incroyable, un personnel qui est formidable et aux petits soins pour vous ! Les jus de fruit sont tellement bons que vous en deviendrez accros ! Pour le personnel : un mot : exceptionnel !!!! La bas vous pouvez compter sur le personnel de l’accueil qui sera à l’écoute de vos demandes et de vos galères durant votre voyage, de plus si vous êtes français, il y a la bas un jeune homme qui parle très bien français et qui est d’une amabilité formidable ! Je remercie encore toute l’équipe de cet hôtel pour leurs professionnalisme plus que parfait !

Overall, really recommend this hotel!

review.rating: Great Hotel in an amazing location
review.room_type: Suite Gia Đình
review.comment_positive:
The Pistachio is situated in a quiet part of Sapa, not too far of a walking distant  to the centre tourist precinct and surrounded by breathtaking mountain views. It was well positioned for our family vaccation of 5 people and had a festive and inviting atmosphere during the festive Xmas season. The hospitality was exceptional with honest and helpful concierge service and clean facilities. The in-house massage service was fantastic and breakfast buffet had a good spread of local and international options.
If you're after a high-end, ritzy experience, the Pistachio is a few minutes walk from Sun Plaza.
review.comment_negative:
Although our holiday was mostly spent exploring the city and outdoors, the only complaint I have is to update the TVs in the rooms for better reception and channels or at the very least have android access so you can stream or mirror your devices. This is more a mod-con luxury.
The gym felt cold and limited, some better lighting, hand towels and music can make a big difference.

review.comment_positive: I booked the room with the mountain view, and it makes you feel like you are in a mystical cloud haven. This hotel's biggest perk for solo travellers is its proximity to Sapa station. Just a stone's throw away, you can easily walk around the centre without worrying about expensive taxis. Exploring Sapa itself is a breeze too. Motorbikes are readily available for hire near the Sapa station, allowing you the freedom to explore the city centre at your own pace.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior City Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The hotel welcome you with nice local cinnamon and ho ey tea. Since our train arrived early, they allowed us to freshen up and shower at the pool common area with clean towels provided. Breakfast spread was exceptional! Though initially stated on booking.com that they provide halal food - however there was none available. However the vegetable options are food and the chef made us pho vegetable out of his curteosy ☺️ Lastly they gave us a goodbye pack with pastry and fruits for our train journey back to Hanoi. Generally was a pleasant stay! Will definitely come back again
review.comment_negative: To provided Halal food option as stated in booking.com

review.comment_positive:
Everything here is PERFECT.  I cannot pin point anything that's less than perfect.  You MUST BOOK THIS HOTEL .

The chef made us fresh noodles for Breakfast as we are pure vegetarians. He checked with us EVERY INGREDIENT  he was to add in the food to know our preferences. 
The Breakfast spread is MIND BLOWING. 
The hotel rooms with MOUNTAIN VIEWS are BREATHTAKING. 

The staff is LOVELY.

review.rating: Overall, it was absolutely a perfect choice for us to stay here
review.room_type: Suite Gia Đình
review.comment_positive:
- The staffs are amazing and friendly. The ginger tea at the lobby was perfect for the weather. The staffs are always attentive and make sure the guests have a wonderful time during the stay
- Room is spacious and clean. We were happy to step into the room whenever we unlocked the door since our very first day of the stay. There are 2 bed rooms and the beds are comfy. Both rooms have TVs with some movies and news channels. 
- Bathroom is spacious too. Bathtub is clean. The complementary Herbal Spa Bath was great. 
- Infinity pool at the roof truly owns a breathtaking view. We can see the mesmerizing mountains and glorious sunset. We can swim at the infinity pool but it is more of a photo-taking spot as the guests mostly wait at the pool to take photo with the stunning view. There is another pool at level 1, the 4 seasons pool. This pool's temperature is adjusted well enough for the guests to swim during the cold days. 
- Hotel location is near the Sa Pa Station (Sun Plaza) which was very convenient for us to go to Fansipan by Monorail. It's also near the Cat Cat village and the market with many restaurants and massage places as well. We can just walk over there from the hotel.
- Breakfast during our 3 days stay was great. The menus were not the same every day and the foods were warm. The breakfast is provided with both local dishes and western dishes which was convenient for us.
review.comment_negative:
Everything was perfect during our stay. I just would like to share 3 feedbacks which were not big deals for us. 
- The shower curtain in bathtub could be removed as it never dries.
- The handheld bidet head from the toilet could be changed too. 
- The WiFi in day time is good but it's quite slow in night time. This might be due to high volume of guests using it at the same time at night.

review.comment_negative: Chambre pas assez propre à notre arrivée (poussière et sol), puis nettoyages simplistes durant notre séjour de 4 nuits (tel baignoire pas rincée). Le premier soir, service du soir avec petite fiche météo, puis plus rien les 3 soirs suivants. Nettoyage de la chambre parfois le matin, parfois l'après-midi. Recharge du thé gratuit oublié 2 x sur 4. Impossible de se doucher sans que de l'eau coule hors de la baignoire. Nous avons dû payer d'avance, sans annulation possible. Si nous avions réservé peu avant, nous aurions payé moins cher (même avec le surclassement que nous avons reçu). Un peu vexant, mais cela fait partie du jeu. Travaux peu gênant durant notre séjour, mais le chantier va durer. A prendre en compte.

review.comment_positive:
I recently stayed at the Pistachio hotel in Sapa, Vietnam and I have to say it was an amazing experience. The staff at the hotel were extremely helpful and friendly, making me feel right at home from the moment I arrived. They were always happy to help with any questions I had and provided excellent service throughout my stay.

One of the highlights of my stay was the breakfast at the hotel. The breakfast was plentiful and offered a wide variety of options, including both Western and Vietnamese cuisine. It was a great way to start the day and gave me plenty of energy to explore the surrounding area.

One of the other great things about this hotel was the option to hire bikes at a very reasonable price. This allowed me to explore the area on my own and really take in the beauty of the surrounding countryside. Although the location of the hotel is a little uphill, it was not too much of a problem because the views from the hotel were absolutely spectacular.

Overall, I had an amazing stay at the Pistachio hotel in Sapa, Vietnam. The staff were excellent, the breakfast was delicious, and the option to hire bikes at a reasonable price was a great way to explore the area. If you're looking for a hotel with great views and excellent service, then I highly recommend the Pistachio hotel in Sapa, Vietnam.

Initially the staff named anh (male night shift) got me misunderstood at first since the charge here in booking.com did not push through which was not told to me first. When we arrive for early check in provided us a room a good room premium deluxe but when he speak to me which is okay at first gave me a room upgrade and a half room rate charge for the early check in so I undeestand everything that he charged me so I confirm that rhe amount I am paying which is 3.2m vnd is the overall payment already for the days stay there but there was a misunderstood and especially the hasel the guy gave us since initial room that we we're supposed to be with is double the amount he upgraded us without ne knowing that the anount we paid is not really yet the amount that we should pay so if we really don't have extra our budget is ruined for our whole trip.

Additional we we're forced decision by ourselves since this is the first time that a hotel does not have a flat iron to lend with there guest I understand their preventive measures since the reason they don't have anymore is there was an incident of fire before, but my take is they don't have option for there guest if all there clothes are all needed to be flat ironed your only optuon is to avail there service which is not good for the guest in terms of being budget friendly.

review.rating: Great location and a great view (for now).
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
The view of the mountains was spectacular (we were on the 9th floor, Mountain View).

And of course, like most places in Vietnam, the staff went out of their way to be helpful and friendly.

Be sure to take a swim in the rooftop infinity pool.  Its not large but the view is terrific.

The location is very good and you can easily walk to the key sites of the city.  It is also well located to walk to the mountaintop cable car or even from which to begin a hike 3 km down to Cat Cat village.
review.comment_negative:
Unfortunately on the mountain side of the building there is a large construction site, presumably another hotel.  At the time of this writing (early July, 2023) the foundation pillars were being  poured (in the mud).  From 8 to 5 the machines were digging the holes deeper. It was sort of entertaining to me to watch the process from above but others might not find it so.  The construction will go on for more than a year and the travel booking sites will never mention it.

It is a shame because one day when the building has been built up the Pistachio will probably lose its wonderful view and become just another hotel.

review.comment_positive:
The hotel is really good value for money. The room was very clean, nicely decorated, with a balcony and beautiful view over the mountains.
The common parts were great, we enjoyed very much the indoor pool and the gym. The pictures of the tribe people all over the common areas are truly gorgeous.
The breakfast is very nice, good assortment and tasty food.
The staff were all excellent, especially the doorman who was always very caring, he was amazing!
We booked 2 tours through the hotel and enjoyed them very much. And the manager was super nice and efficient.
review.comment_negative:
The infinity pool is awesome, but the water is very cold. Of course  it would be a waste of energy to warm it up as it is outdoor.
There are heavy works to build big hotels all around Sapa, and it seems they are building a big one in front of the Pistachio. It was a bit noisy in the morning with the works, as of beginning of August 2023, but nothing to complain about, we slept very well.

review.rating: Exceptional stay! Prime location, outstanding staff, and thoughtful.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
My stay at the Pistachio Hotel was truly exceptional for several reasons. Firstly, its prime location near Sun Plaza was incredibly convenient, especially with its proximity to Halal Restaurants, making dining options easily accessible within walking distance.

Moreover, what truly set this hotel apart was its remarkable staff. They were not only welcoming but also went above and beyond to ensure a comfortable stay. Their willingness to assist and extend help made the experience all the more enjoyable.

The cleanliness of the rooms was impeccable, creating a welcoming atmosphere. What added a personal touch was the thoughtful gesture of a little note left in the room, providing information about whether forecast for the following day. It was these small details that made the stay memorable and showcased the hotel's commitment to guest satisfaction.

Overall, the Pistachio Hotel not only met but exceeded expectations. Its location, coupled with the helpful staff and attention to detail, made it a standout choice for accommodation.

Enjoyed my stay tremendously. Room is extremely clean, spacious, well equipped and bed is so comfortable. 

Took a nice relaxing swim in the indoor pool ( heated) after returning from  2 days of trekking . Would love to swim in the sky pool at level 12 but the water was too cold. Nonetheless, enjoyed the amazing views from there.

Staff were all very helpful and welcoming with a smile on their faces at all times. Ms Chau, guest relations manager upgraded my room to a deluxe room  when I checked in for my first night. Did a homestay on my 2nd night and was pleasantly surprised when I returned to Pistachio hotel with another free room upgrade, this time to an executive suite! Both rooms are spacious with fantastic views of the mountains. 

Would definitely return to this hotel the next time I come to Sapa.

review.comment_positive: لقد حظينا بإقامة رائعة في الفندق ! الفندق ذو موقع مثالى، إنه على بعد حوالى 5 - 10 دقائق سيرا على الأقدام من وسط المدينة. الغرف رائعة، مرافق رائعة وإطلالة رائعة على الجبال . لا يوجد شيء خاطئ في بوفيه الإفطار أيضًا؛ حيث يوجد مزيج جيد من الأطباق الغربية والفيتنامية وكذلك قربة من المطاعم الحلال .

Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Zimmer war groß, sauber und im 10. Stock, daher mit toller Aussicht. Idee des Infinity Pools (ABER…). Personal an der Rezeption und im Restaurant (Lunch) war Aufmerksam und Hilfsbereit.
review.comment_negative:
An den Pools (Innen & Außen) waren zu wenig Liegen / Sitzmöglichkeiten. Der Infinity Pool sieht auf den Bildern schöner und größer aus als er ist. Alles ist etwas in die Jahre gekommen und wenn man nicht nur für ein schnelles Bild in den Pool möchte ist dieser für Sapa definitiv zu kalt (August). Die Preise im Spa waren viel zu teuer (wer zahlt in Vietnam so viel für eine Massage, wo es an jeder Ecke tolle und günstigere Angebote gibt?) Fitness war zu klein und zu wenig Geräte. Zudem war die Luft nach 10 Minuten Laufband völlig verbraucht und zu warm. (Keine Lüftung, Klimaanlage oder öffnende Fenster). Im Indoorpool hat es komisch gerochen, nicht einladend. Der gesamte Indoorpool, Spa und Fitness bereich liegt im Keller und so fühlt man sich dort auch. Wenig einladend gestaltet.
Frühstücksauswahl für Europäer sehr schlecht. Essen beim Lunch eher fad und für den Preis nichts besonderes. Rooftopbar war ansprechend und mit toller Aussicht jedoch wurden wir nach 20 Minuten nicht bedient, obwohl wir die Einzigen Besucher waren. Wir sind dann ohne Bestellung wieder gegangen.

Ik probeerde tevergeefs twee scooters voor een paar dagen te huren bij dit hotel. Dat kon dus niet, alleen per dagdeel, en die omvatten geen avond. Dus huren per twee dagdelen, betekent ophalen om 8:00 met een litertje benzine in je tank en inleveren om uiterlijk 20:00 uur. De volgende dag krijg je weer een andere motor die je dan weer kunt vullen. Er was NIET over te praten, ook al vond de receptionist het zelf ook wel vreemd. Beleid van de directie. 
Wij hebben maar twee scooters voor twee dagen gehuurd bij de buren. Goedkoper, ongecompliceerd en service with a smile.

review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel erfüllt alle Kriterien für einen wundervollen Aufenthalt in Sapa. Von unserer Ankunft mitten in der Nacht, über viele dutzende Fragen unsererseits bis zu einem theoretisch problemlosen late check-out war alles rundum perfekt. Wir verlängerten unseren Aufenthalt um 3 Nächte und konnten somit noch öfters das tolle Frühstücksbuffet sowie die vom Personal für uns und unsere 2 kleinen Kinder extra abgestimmten Wandermöglichkeiten genießen. 
Vielen Dank an das gesamte Personal!

review.comment_positive: We were given a free upgrade to Premium Deluxe room and it is at level 9 corner facing the valley. The view is magnificant. Room size is huge with a 2 seater sofa, a work desk and bathtub. The hotel has an infinity pool at roof top as well as an indoor pool next to a gym. The front desk was very helpful in providing advice and arranging for day trip.
review.comment_negative: While the hotel is located uphill behind the city area, it will take 5-10 minutes to walk to the town centre and walking back to hotel is an upslope walk. For me, the view from the room is more than sufficient to compensate this slight inconvinient

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: views and the staff were very helpful the location was also convenient
review.comment_negative: nothing much just one of my room the door needs abit of effort to close

review.rating: Gorgeous hotel, stunning view, delicious tea
review.room_type: Phòng Superior City Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Beautiful, clean hotel room with lots of complimentary toiletries
Ming, the waiter and bartender was very kind - it was great to see a smiling face at the bar and breakfast.
The staff at reception were very kind
The Sa Pa tea (complimentary) served in the lobby was delicious - we arrived at 6.30am and were welcome to stay in the lobby and sip tea on the lounges until check-in at 2pm. 
The heated pool was perfect after a long day climbing the stairs of Fansipan.
review.comment_negative:
The view - Check the weather before you book! Sa Pa is high up in the clouds which means the view from the 12th floor infinity pool might be white/a cloud. This might disappoint if you are staying here for the magnificent mountain view.
No sauna - the staff said the sauna was removed 1 year ago. 
The door locking system - we struggled in most times we needed to exit the hotel room. The locking system is complicated and frustrating at times, and there weren’t any instructions on how to lock the door without the alarm going off. The staff gave us a tutorial however the locking system doesn’t need to be this complicated. As young people we struggled, we feel for the older generations who aren’t as tech-savvy…
Cleanliness - all areas that are visible are absolutely spotless, however areas under beds, couches, bedside tables and cabinets need to be vacuumed. This doesn’t really bother us but when we were trying to find a lost item it was kinda surprising to see the dust and rubbish in such a fine hotel.
Bottled water - for the price you pay, you would expect more complimentary bottled water each day.

review.comment_negative: Noisy with many guest rooms that they like to open their room doors at all time and talking, kids screaming. I feel disturbed. And the hotel provide 2 bottles of drinking water as complimentary but they placed 2 bottles on the desk and 2 bottles in the fridge. Guest didn’t know which one is for complimentary drink and which one to be charged so I drank the one in the fridge and I just realized that these bottles I have to paid when I checked out. This that need you to improve the higher standard of service by place a label on the complimentary bottles so the guest will not mistaken drink the one that you charge. I hope you can change this for your own benefit. Thank you

Not very nice hotel to be 4 stars. Staff is not as nice as in other hotels in Vietnam. The front desk told our guide that we had checked out (not true) which almost made us miss our trekking tour. Breakfast is not very good, it feels like most things are not fresh.

Also, if you travel in the winter keep in mind that the rooftop pool is not heated and very cold.

Would recommend staying elsewhere, perhaps a nicer homestay instead.

review.comment_positive: Outstanding service, beautiful hotel, extremely clean and comfortable rooms, fantastic facilities. My partner and I stayed for 3 nights and it was without a doubt the best hotel we stayed in in Vietnam. The staff were incredibly helpful throughout our stay, offering us a free upgrade, allowing us to check in early, providing us with free tea when we arrived and offering genuine concern and support when my boyfriend was unwell. We cannot thank this hotel enough for their hospitality. The facilities are great and the rooftop pool is stunning, you are literally swimming in the mountains. The beds are very comfortable, the rooms are large and well maintained, well above the standard of most hotels in Vietnam. I cannot recommend this hotel more, thank you for everything!

review.comment_positive:
Nous avons adoré notre séjour au Pistachio Hôtel.

Le personnel est très accueillant et attentionné, et nous ont bien aidé pour organiser notre séjour à Sapa. En plus, ils ont eu la gentillesse de nous surclasser pour une chambre très spacieuse avec une vue magnifique sur la vallée et les rizières.
Le lit était très confortable et la chambre très propre.
Le petit déjeuner était excellent.

On a également apprécié se prélasser dans la piscine (du 1er) après le petit déjeuner.

Nous reviendrons sans hésiter au Pistachio lors de notre prochain voyage à Sa pa !

Our room is big, spacious and very clean. Facing the mountain view and we get to see the Funicular passby from our balcony. 

Facilities is also good. They have inhouse spa, warm pool and infinity pool. 

Hotel nearby Hawa Halal Restaurant and Sun Plaza, Sapa Station. All are walking distance.
review.comment_negative:
As we are muslim,  there is no halal food. Our breakfast choice is either bread, salad or half boil egg for 3 days. 

Its our anniversary but too bad, the hotel not able to  provide a small cake for us to celebrate in hotel room.

review.rating: Amazing stay with pistachio hotel, highly recommend
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Booked 3 rooms for family of 3 adult couples and we were very impressed with our stay here. We had beautiful views from our balcony of Sapa town and the mountains from our room on 10th floor. The size of the rooms are huge! Biggest rooms we have had so far in our trip throughout Vietnam.  Bed was massive with 2 pillows each to pick from, both were comfortable. Our bathroom had a bath and shower, with 3 different water/shower heads. This is important to woman that don’t want to get their hair wet so to be able to adjust the shower head to your height is wonderful. Room offers a safe, which is easy to set up. 
Great rooftop pool overlooking the mountains, the perfect spot for selfie photos if you are self made influencers or just want to impress your friends haha, (saw many couples taking photos by the pool and leave) lovely staff in bar on rooftop and great happy hour drinks between 4 - 5.30pm. 
We had arrived at 8am and they took our luggage and offered us showers before we started our day trek at 9am with Sapa sisters. The next day breakfast was good. Many different options available with beautiful mountain
Views. Check out at 12pm but our train wasn’t until late night, they offered to hold our luggage and we were able to use all their facilities, inside and outside pool, gym and showers etc which I thought was a lovely gesture to guests. 

We organised transfers with the hotel to and from train station and they even packed us snacks for everyone for our train trip and a beautiful hand written note. 

Can’t recommend this hotel enough. Great price for a luxury hotel. Outstanding service.
review.comment_negative: Service slow at rooftop bar, maybe need another staff member during happy hour, it gets busy.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Het personeel is zo behulpzaam en vriendelijk. Ook waren de kamers erg schoon en mooi. Toppunt was de karaokebar, waar niet heel veel mensen waren maar dat was wel echt heel leuk! We wilde graag nog een dag ontspanning en konden voor dezelfde prijs onze kamer bijboeken. Het zwembad was mooi! maar een beetje te koud om echt lekker te zwemmen, leuk voor de foto.
review.comment_negative: De verbouwingen rondom het hotel. We boekte een (duurdere) kamer met mountainview. De verbouwingen waren vol aan de gang voor de deur en daardoor niet een heel mooi uitzicht. Ook was het te mistig. Kan het hotel natuurlijk niets aan doen maar dat was wel jammer. Ook vond ik alles prijziger dan we gewend waren van Vietnam.

review.rating: EXCEPTIONAL property, staff, rooms, views, pool and breakfast!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: I REALLY liked this hotel and staff!!!  It was clean and beautiful, and the staff was extremely helpful.  I'd like to thank Tran Chau who helped us arrange train tickets on very short notice.  She even waited to be sure we got off okay from the hotel.  She was a true PROFESSIONAL!  The views from the hotel were really nice.  There was some construction in the city below the hotel, but that will be finished one of these days.  The rooms were just wonderful and welcoming.  I would definetly recommend this hotel and BTW the breakfast is EXCEPTIONAL!  The infinity pool was absolutely beautiful, though we went in winter and didn't use it. As for the bathrooms in the rooms, they were lovely and clean!
review.comment_negative: I cannot think of anything negative about the hotel!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Incredible view from both our room and the pool, great room, fantastic location (easy walk to most of town) and good breakfast. We arrived early in the morning on the sleeper train, and staff allowed us to use the showers by the indoor pool to freshen up and then stored our bags until we were able to check in that afternoon. We didn't find the construction noise to be that bad, but we were on a high floor so were above it rather than looking out at it directly.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: We got a free room upgrade to a spacious suite and the view from the balcony was simply stunning. The town centre and Sun Plaza was an easy 5-min walk away. Breakfast was delicious with decent spread of eastern and western food. We were very lucky to have perfect weather during our 2-day stay. The view was beautiful all around Sapa.
review.comment_negative: I personally prefers a walk-in shower to a shower over bath. It was a bit difficult to climb into the tall bath. The bathroom can do with more hanging hooks too.

review.comment_positive:
- nice view and location (except for the construction site below)
- friendly staff

- rooftop bar
review.comment_negative:
- the infinity pool has great views but seems to be only for marketing purposes: the water is very cold, so you can’t use it in the early morning or in late afternoon. But you also can’t use it in the middle of the day (the warmest part of the day) because the pool is not working from 11 till 15 🤷🏻‍♀️ So we didn’t have a chance to swim in the infinity pool (and we stayed there for 3 nights…);
- the construction works below the hotel starts at 7-8 am. The noise is really bad. We woke up every morning because of this. Should have brought earplugs.

review.rating: Best Value Luxury Stay in Sapa!

Oh and the views of the mountains from the balcony in the morning is fantastic! Best value for the hotels in the area in terms of service, views and breakfast included as well. Bathtub should I keep going? Walking distance to the main town

We got upgraded to the presidential suite and it was the most incredible room we have ever seen! Everything about our stay was perfect - including the views from the rooftop pool - wow!

review.rating: The most perfect and relaxing stay
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thung Lũng
review.comment_positive: Everything was amazing !! We extended our stay and wished we could stay even longer. Every single worker was helpful and extremely nice. All receptionists speak English and some also speak french. They were attentive to every little detail, I rarely witnessed such a great communication between the different departments. The room was perfectly clean and spacious. Gorgeous bathroom with a beautiful bathtub. Large balcony with view on the mountains and rice fields. Large confortable bed, modern TV. The restaurant has a great selection of courses and the breakfast has everything you need: vegetables, different rices, pasta, eggs and noodles made on the spot + the typical American/European breakfast (toasts, jam, salad etc). A tasty ginger tea is also available all day at the reception. The swimming pool is extra clean and offers a breathtaking view. + a cosy bar with karaoke and a wonderful spa with the most attentive masseuses. Everything was neat and the service extremely professional. The billing service was also perfect: very clear and transparent (for all the extras within the hotel). We honestly think this must be the best hotel in the entire region. Extra point: beautiful location for instagram pictures ;) We will be back for sure !!!
review.comment_negative: absolutely nothing negative to say. It felt like home.

review.comment_positive:
Everything about my stay was fantastic! When I was checking in, I received a free upgrade and a voucher for herbal bath, which was amazing (especially the room!). The staff are constantly checking if everything is okay, and have regular nice chats as well. The view was BREATHTAKING, especially from the rooftop pool! Breakfast was great as well - had a large selection and a few delicacies (like sushi!). The gym was small, but had enough equipment for me.

Overall, in the 30+ countries I travelled to, this is the best hotel I ever stayed in.

review.comment_positive: I don’t know where to start, but if you are looking for a place to stay in Sapa, don’t think twice! The room: We booked the Deluxe Room with a Balcony & Mountain View, it was very spacious, felt warm and we got everything we needed, not to mentioned the view. The Bed was SO comfortable and big, we didn’t wanna wake up! I slept like a baby! The Breakfast: no words… I don’t remember when was the last time I had such a buffet with absolutely everything. We didn’t want to leave the place. The View & the pool: the view from the room and the top floor is just AMAZING! We liked that there was a second pool (indoor) as well, cause in Sapa it can be quite cold in the early morning or after the sunset. The Stuff: one of the best service we’ve ever experienced. Not only we got our room a bit earlier, we got the option for a late check out without extra fee (I know it also depends on the day and if the room need to be ready for a new guest or not). We have to mention Chau from the reception. Her service was exceptional, she went above & beyond to make our stay so comfortable! All in all such a great value for money. If I had the chance to rate more than 10 stars I would have done it.

Die Kommunikation mit dem Personal war teilweise schwierig, da nur schlecht englisch verstanden und gesprochen wurde. So bekamen wir z.B. zweimal das falsche Essen geliefert. 
Wir reisten wie die meisten mit dem Nachtzug nach Sa Pa, der in Lao Cai um 5:30 morgens ankommt. 
Die Zimmer sind allerdings erst ab 14:00 Uhr verfügbar. Obwohl dieser Fall vermutlich häufig Eintritt, werden hier vom Hotelpersonal keine Angebote gemacht. Auf konkrete Nachfrage bekamen wir ein Frühstück und durften mit Bademänteln an den Pool. 
Das Zimmer war schön, allerdings war der Duschkopf defekt, die Badewanne undicht und das Bett sehr hart.

review.comment_positive: Overall, it's an average 4-star hotel. Everything is decent and nice. The special part about this hotel is the infinity pool with the valley view. Bathtub is a plus too.
review.comment_negative:
1. Breakfast - the breakfast was just a normal serve. With that price, I would expect something the same level as Hoi An hotel. The selections were limited and simple. 

2. Construction noise - booked the valley view room with extra price, but the construction noise and view are overwhelmed. Vietnamese are hardworking people, and their construction continued even during the weekend. 

3. Air condition - can't customise the air cond, and sometimes it's still freezing in April. 

Based on the price, I expect something more. Especially the breakfast part.

review.rating: This hotel is big, clean, and is conveniently located to downtown Sa Pa.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: The view from the room was amazing! We had a Mountain View, and it was lovely to see the clouds roll into the valley. The room itself was quite large, and so was the bed. The king sized bed was made by pushing two single size beds together, so there was a line running down the middle, but that didn’t bother us at all. There was a refrigerator in the room, which was extremely handy, and the temperature in the room was excellent. (It is controlled in each room.) The enormous bathroom is separated from the main room by a giant window, so if you don’t want your roommate to watch you use the bathroom, you have to drop the curtain. However, it is lovely to take a shower or bath (the tub is magical) while looking at the mountains. The included breakfast was great. There were so many choices. It seems like there was food for every taste. The employees were all very friendly. They helped us arrange transportation and offered suggestions on what to do in Sa Pa. They are also will to hold luggage for an entire day after you check out.
review.comment_negative: There was the constant sound of water running through the walls in the bathroom. It sounded a little like an indoor water fountain. If you are into ASMR, this would likely be a plus, but if you are sound-sensitive, it might be too much. Also, I wished the pools and weight room were open later. They closed at 6:00 or 6:30, and that made them difficult to use if you also wanted to go out into the town.

review.rating: Pleasant stay, definately would recommend to stay in Sapa

review.comment_positive: Initially we have booked another hotel in SaPa, but they informed us on renovation, so basically asked to cancel. after search we have booked Pistachio due to customer rating and also discount offered. It was very pleasant stay, we arrived very early, so hotel gave us room from 10 a.m., recommended pleases for breakfast, arranged transfers, also we had very late train to Hanoi, so even we were already checked out, provided us the shower and some snacks for the trip. Lady in the reception (I do not remember the name) was supporting us during all our stay. Many thanks for the personnel! Breakfast was with very good choice - cold, hot meal, fruits, corns, cakes.... very nice view from the roof pool, although it was a bit cold water :-). There were some constructions in the neighbourhood, so a bit noisy in our room in the morning, but they finish early, so not problems in the evening

see you soon in the next time 🥰😍

- sehr gutes Frühstücks Buffet
- große Zimmer und haben ein Upgrade umsonst erhalten
- konnten nachts um 3 und eine Nacht früher  einchecken mit einem kleinen Aufpreis
- auf Anfrage, ob wir eine Nacht länger bleiben können, wurde unser Aufenthalt ohne Aufpreis verlängert

- gute Lage
- schöner Pool

- Bad ist super, Duschvorhang könnte man aber mal austauschen
- Wäscherei ist überteuert

review.comment_positive: The hotel is good and everything is like on the pictures. Friendly stuff and nice breakfast.
review.comment_negative: We had one of the most expensive rooms (mountain view) at level 11 of 12. There was an area just in front to the hotel with nothing but roosters... They are so loud and violent from 5:30 am on that sleeping is impossible (Windows closed). This is not acceptable for a hotel of this quality. If you cant get rid of the roosters because they are not yours at least use good glas for the windows. I can not give this hotel a better rating. Without it it would deserve an 8. I dont recommend this place if you want to sleep peaceful. (Bed looks super big but is made out of 2 matrazes. So you feel the gap whipe sleep - not comfy)

review.comment_positive: Nothing, really. It’s overpriced, there is no Mountain View bc they build a new hotel right in front of the view. The balcony has no chair to sit down and enjoy the views of the builders probably bc they know you wouldn’t do that. They advertise a walk in shower, but it’s an old tub what they can’t clean properly anymore. I booked for 2 adults and a 9 years old and they gave as a room after 10 hours waiting with a small double bed. When I asked for an extra bed they told me it’s extra 700.000 dong but when I had to pay they said it’s only 500.000 bc at the booking I already paid 200.000 for the extra bed I requested but it was a wrong price  advertised on booking. They are beyond ridiculous.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: La ubicación no es para nada mala
review.comment_negative:
No entiendo las puntuaciones tan altas, está hecho para el turismo oriental en masa.

Una humedad en la habitación descomunal, a eso le sumas frío en la habitación y tienes la combinación perfecta, ya que no tienes posibilidad de calefacción salvo una estufa portátil de los años 90 que te traen desde recepción. 

Se cuela el agua de la bañera hacia la habitación a través del Cristal.

Tras la primera noche, decidimos cambiarnos de hotel, desgraciadamente la dirección del hotel no nos ayudó en nada ni se interesaron sobre el porqué de este cambio. Tampoco tuvieron el detalle de no cobrar la Segunda noche que no disfrutamos en el hotel. Aún así, nos cambiamos de hotel porqué era imposible pasar otra noche en esa habitación con esas condiciones.

Breakfast was provided with good quality. The golden ring pool at the rooftop is as stunning as advertised. Overall worth every penny. and we got free upgrade!

review.comment_positive: Et av få hoteller i sør-øst Asia som faktisk lever opp til fire stjerner. Rent og fint og hyggelige ansatte, spesielt Tina (tràn) var veldig hyggelig. Deilig frokost med godt utvalg og flinke kokker.  Nydelig utsikt fra bassenget på taket. Bra beliggenhet med gangavstand til sapa lake, fansipan togstasjon og gode restauranter.

review.comment_positive: Likely, one of this best hotels in Sapa. 5 minutes walk away from main shopping and restaurant areas, with unbeatable views from most rooms and rooftop pool. Great breakfast selection and heated indoor pool adds to the value. Yes, some of the furniture shows wear if you're nitpicking, but overall what you get for your 40 or 50 eur a night is a truly comfortable stay in a real 4* hotel with amazing location, views and service.
review.comment_negative: Spa is supposedly open until 11pm but was not able to accomodate a simple herbal bath request for 10pm.

review.comment_negative:
Wir haben bei der Buchung extra angegeben, dass wir bereits früh am Morgen anreisen würden. Als wir gegen 7 Uhr morgens ankamen, wurde uns lediglich mitgeteilt, dass wir bis 14 Uhr warten müssten, bis wir einchecken können. Uns wurde hier weder ein Wasser oder sonst etwas angeboten, um die Wartezeit zu überbrücken. Stattdessen teilte man uns mit, dass wir unter Zahlung einer zusätzlichen Gebühr von 150K vietnamesischer Dong extra pro Person zum Frühstücks Buffet gehen könnten. Bei der Zahlung dann die böse Überraschung: Die Dame an der Rezeption teilte uns den falschen Preis mit, sodass wir anstatt 300VD das Doppelte, also 600VD zahlen mussten. Dieser Preis inkludiert übrigens bereits einen Tipp, der keinesfalls gerechtfertigt war, da es beim Buffet keinen Service gab. Für ein 4 Sterne Hotel war der gesamte Prozess des Eincheckens also mehr als schlecht. 

Wir fragten an der Rezeption zudem nach der Vermittlung einer Tracking Tour Bzw. Nach Tipps für einen entsprechenden Veranstalter. Man konnte uns keinen nennen und auch auf Nachfrage erhielten wir keinerlei Hilfe, sodass wir selber im Ort gesucht haben.

But I think that is common for Sapa hotels. This made the beds feel wet because it is cold and humid at the same time, didn't like that feeling. Sapa is very foggy, wet and cold when I went, hence the streets are quite dirty. The bathing towels aren't nice too.

review.comment_positive:
Location - centrally located, walking distance to other eating places, train station
Staff - very helpful and cheerful - esp Chau (female) and the guy at the reception in the early to late evening (sorry, I was not able to take your name, but we do appreciate your helpfulness).
Housekeeping - our room was as clean as new after makeup on our 2nd day!
Breakfast - great selection and new food items are introduced daily. We always sit next to the window to enjoy the view while having breakfast
Room - super excellent. I think we got an upgrade! great mountain view, able to see the train every 8 mins or so, room is enormous - with living area, balcony, enormous T&B with bathtub, and space allocated for a table +  chair which allowed us to work for few days!
review.comment_negative: the excavation next to the hotel was a bit noisy but resolved when you closed the door. This is beyond the hotel's control so this is not a complaint but more of stating a fact and setting expectations when you decide to go for mountain view

review.comment_positive:
- Location wise very great, located just behind sun plaza or 5 mins walking
- Reception very helpful, Nam especially very thoughtful offering assistance with motorbike rental, all necessary information you need during your stay. They even upgraded me to Premium Deluxe Room
- Breakfast option really amaze me and it was tasty! They serve pho also during breakfast time
- I arrived by sleeper bus at 4AM, they let you wait in the lobby and use their shower room in 4th floor just in front of the swimming pool. They also provide locker you can use
- A litte tip is to book yourself a room at Deluxe or Premium Deluxe which overlook to the mountain and fansipan monorail train!

review.rating: Friendly staff. Super clean room. Highly accomodating services.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Very clean. Very friendly. Very attentive. Everyone was so lovely to us. We took a sleeper bus from Ninh Binh to Sapa and unfortunately arrived at 5:30am. Check in being at 12, they allowed us to sleep in the lobby on the couch and made sure we were comfortable.

After going for some lunch, we came back and were greeted with tea and a massive room upgrade curtesy of miss Tran Minh Chau, she was very lovely and accomodating. Organising a taxi upon our leave and also making sure we knew where everything was.

The room and view was something else. I don’t think we will ever see something like that again (unless we come back here which we will).

Unfortunate we didn’t get to try out the Spa as I was a bit unwell but if the standard of the spa matched the rest of the hotel and service I’m sure it would have been fantastic.

Side note, they were also kind enough to hold our luggage before we got our room when we went for lunch, as well as held our luggage on checkout as we didn’t need to take a taxi until later in the day.

All round, this is a fantastic place, and we will be here again. I’m sure of it.

Some of the light in the room is mulfunction and the shower temputure is hard to adjust and not stable.

La habitación está muy bien, al igual que el baño. El personal es muy atento, sin duda alguna lo recomiendo y repetiría.

review.rating: Overpriced for a very rundown hotel.
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thung Lũng
review.comment_positive: The front reception staff did their best to accommodate us through a few challenges.
review.comment_negative:
1. Booking.com deceiving by allowing us to add child to booking, and clearly stating our child stays for free, but the fine print indicated we had to pay and extra USD45 per night for the child’s bed.
2. When we were told the room was ready for us to enter, we had to wait outside the room for another 5 minutes while the cleaners finished. 
3. The first shower resulted in water everywhere on the floor, I asked for more towels, and discovered that the only way to stop the water running onto the floor (from the in bath shower) was to place towels around the edge of bath! Not what I expect from a premium room! 
4. I used the sink tap and the tap came off in my hand and water went everywhere! We had to turn it off under the sink and wait for maintenance. 
5. The breakfast buffet was average, including the hair in my daughters Pho 
6. In general, the facilities are all very run down, this hotel has a great view, however that’s where it ends unfortunately
7. We paid 900k for transport back to the train station and the driver had a go at us for not offering a tip!

review.rating: The ideal Hotel for a stay in Sa Pa
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
First impression: Everything looked nice and tidy. The rooms were perfectly clean. We had a room with a mountain view, and it was really stunning. Even with clouds and fog, the view is magical. Breakfast was nice too, with many choices, both Western and Asian options. There is an indoor pool, which is heated, and a pool on the roof, which is not heated (so something for the summer :) ). The hotel is not located in the busy center but close to it, so you can reach the center within 5 minutes of walking.

What was exceptional was the staff. I want to mention a very friendly security guard whose name I unfortunately don't know, and the receptionist Trang. She was what every hotel needs: warm, welcoming, and helpful (for example, she gave us her honest opinion about some "attractions"). We really enjoyed coming back to the hotel as she always had a smile on her face and was asking how our day was. She likes what she does, and you just feel at home when you re-enter the lobby.

Sun world up the road for the cable car and everything else at sun world, the train down the road into sun world for everything. Restaurants close enough. I'd do it again. You can take it easy or kill yourself on walks, choices abound.

review.comment_positive: I loved our stay here, the staff were very friendly and helpful with advice on sights in the area and always happy to help and had tea on hand for those colder days! They even made us corn milk for breakfast as we are vegan and it was delicious. We got upgraded when we arrived and were given a free herbal bath voucher for the spa and 20% off treatments that they offered. The bath was exceptional. The pool downstairs was very nice and warm and the views (when the sky cleared) were worth every penny! The room was huge and very clean and comfortable. Location was very central which was great because it's a very hilly area!
review.comment_negative: The pool and gym were nice but a little small. Unfortunately the roof pool was too cold to use. Would be nice if there were more vegan options for the restaurant.

review.comment_positive: 전반적으로 호텔이 깨끗하였습니다 그리고 조식도 기대이상이었습니다 위치는 썬플라워사파역과 가까워서 좋았습니다 직원들이 대체로 친절하였으며 특히 Robert Tan 이라는 직원이 사파에 좋은기억을 선사했습니다. 그가 오토바이렌탈,캐빈버스 예약을 꼼꼼히 도와주었습니다. 판시판 예약도 도와주었는데 날씨도 체크해주는 세심함이 돋보였습니다. 그리고 운이 좋게도 방을 2단계 업그레이드 받을 수 있었습니다 그리고 밤버스 때까지 짐을 보관해주고 로비에서 쉴 수 있어 좋았습니다
review.comment_negative: 특별히 아쉬운 점은 없었고 사파는 아직도 개발이 많이 되고 있어 주위에 공사장이 많습니다 소음은 조금 있었지만 밤시간에는 조용해서 특별히 문제는 없었습니다

review.rating: Great views from the room and really helpful staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
The location was great, over looking the rice paddy valleys, which was great for watching the cloud roll in and out. It was a short walk to the centre of Sa Pa which has plenty of options for food and shopping if that's your thing. The staff were great, we arrived early morning from the night train and they made sure we were able to shower, using the facilities from the indoor pool. They also helped arrange a driver for the return to the train station a couple of days later and made us some packed lunches for the train ride.

The room was spacious, clean and with a very comfortable bed! We booked this last minute after our home stay was cancelled! The roof top pool is a good spot for those who are fans of Instagram!

review.comment_positive: We loved the staff! Warm and very helpful! We want to give a shout out to Vuong, Trinh, Nam and Chau. They helped us with booking and daily advice. Also they were extremely genuine and personable. Hotel itself is ideally located with beautiful views and breakfast was very good. Then even upgraded us and let us check-in earlier. We really felt like home away from home. Also, their tea that they serve in the lobby is so delicious (best we have had ever!), we want the recipe:) ! All in all great value for your money and for your experience in Sapa.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Роскошный отель, шикарная отделка, вежливый персонал, хорошо владеет английским.
Помогли, забронировали нам sleep bus до Халонга.
Приносят распечатку с прогнозом погоды на следующий день - очень мило. 
Шикарный бассейн на крыше, вид изумительный. Вода там не подогревается, ночью прохладно, так что она очень освежает. Есть подогреваемый бассейн на 1 этаже, там же, где тренажёры. Сильно пахло хлоркой, решили все же взбодриться в верхнем.
Завтраки хорошие, не хватило маракуйи и бананов, чтобы сделать этот завтрак лучшим в нашем путешествии.
Очень хотелось поставить отелю максимальную оценку, но некоторые обстоятельства расстроили.
review.comment_negative:
Крайне нестабильный WiFi, от слова совсем.
Под отелем чуть ниже ведётся стройка, в 7 утра уже сваи забивали, ужас. С учётом того, что это только подготовка фундамента, шум этот надолго... 
Персонал громко разговаривает в коридорах, в том числе ранним утром. Шумоизоляция в номерах слабая, поэтому это очень мешало сну.
Уборку пришли проводить в 15 часов, когда мы отдыхали после обеда. Позже так и не вернулись. Хотя мы отдыхали двумя парами и к ним потом все же зашли занести свежие полотенца. У нас было очень пыльно, пришлось пользоваться ингалятором.
Проблемный интернет, шум и пыль испортили впечатление
